title: Chlorophyte Ore
summaries: Chlorophyte Ore is a Hardmode ore found in the Underground Jungle that is used to craft Chlorophyte Bars. When Hardmode starts, Mud Blocks located near Jungle grass blocks (i.e., most often only in the Underground Jungle) will begin to convert themselves into Chlorophyte Ore. A pickaxe or drill with at least 200% pickaxe power is required to mine it, meaning it requires the Pickaxe Axe or Drax at the very least, whose materials require defeating all three mechanical bosses (although on 3DS[img:Nintendo 3DS version], the Drax can sometimes be found in Shadow Chests).

Chlorophyte Ore will slowly spread itself by converting adjacent Mud and Jungle grass blocks into more Chlorophyte Ore, growing to large deposits over time. <linked>Chlorophyte Bricks</linked> also have  this ability. This growing feature allows the Chlorophyte Ore to be "replanted" and artificially seeded for a nearly renewable source of Chlorophyte. On the <linked>[img:Desktop version]</linked><linked> Desktop version</linked>, <linked>[img:Console version]</linked><linked> Console version</linked>, and <linked>[img:Mobile version]</linked><linked> Mobile version</linked>, Chlorophyte will also attempt to spread by converting nearby <linked>Dirt Blocks</linked> to Mud, as well as <linked>Corrupt</linked>, <linked>Crimson</linked>, <linked>Hallowed</linked> and regular <linked>grass</linked> blocks to Jungle grass.

Chlorophyte Ore can only spread and convert blocks if it is in or below the bottom half of the <linked>Underground</linked> layer (in a regular world). It can only spread itself to directly adjacent tiles (and only if there is not <linked>too much</linked> Chlorophyte nearby already) and can only convert tiles up to five tiles away.
